data.name: listBox1.Items1
data.value: At OnyxHotel, accessible from OnyHotel, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by OnyxHotel and how we use it.

data.name: >>listBox1.Type
data.value: System.Windows.Forms.ListBox, System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

data.name: listBox1.Items3
data.value: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

data.name: listBox1.Items5
data.value: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in OnyxHotel. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels

data.name: listBox1.Items6
data.value: other than this website. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the Free Privacy Policy Generator.

data.name: label1.Text
data.value: OnyxHotel Privacy Policy

data.name: listBox1.Items8
data.value: Consent

data.name: listBox1.Items11
data.value: Information we collect

data.name: listBox1.Items19
data.value: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

data.name: listBox1.Items29
data.value: OnyxHotel follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet

data.name: listBox1.Items39
data.value: the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.

data.name: listBox1.Items49
data.value: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:

data.value: When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.

data.name: listBox1.Items46
data.value: You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.

data.name: listBox1.Items66
data.value: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.

data.value: Children's Information

data.name: listBox1.Items33
data.value: Like any other website, OnyxHotel uses 'cookies'. These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.

data.name: listBox1.Items80
data.value: best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.

data.name: >>label1.Parent
data.value: $this

data.name: listBox1.Items14
data.value: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.

data.name: >>label1.Type
data.value: System.Windows.Forms.Label, System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

data.name: listBox1.Items44
data.value: OnyxHotel's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.

data.name: listBox1.Items64
data.value: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.

data.name: listBox1.Items74
data.value: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

data.name: listBox1.Items30
data.value: Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.

data.name: listBox1.Items60
data.value: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:

data.value: Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on OnyxHotel, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize

data.value: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
